sourcesContent:
{{title}}
import { Component, Inject, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { MdbModalRef } from 'mdb-angular-ui-kit/modal'; import { SharedService } from 'src/app/shared.service'; import { ToastrService } from 'ngx-toastr'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-edit', templateUrl: './add-edit.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-edit.component.css'] }) export class AddEditComponent implements OnInit { public title: string = ''; public dep: any; constructor( public modalRef: MdbModalRef, private service: SharedService, private toastr: ToastrService, private router: Router ) { } ngOnInit(): void { } Save(){ this.service.InsertDepartment(this.dep).subscribe(res =>{ this.toastr.success(res, 'Toastr fun!', { positionClass: 'toast-top-center', timeOut:3000 }); this.modalRef.close(); this.router.navigateByUrl('/'); }) } Update(){ this.service.UpdateDepartment(this.dep).subscribe(res =>{ alert(res); }) } }
